rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer leading to the living area. Uses local stone and sustainable materials.
Open space designed for family gatherings; includes eco-friendly flooring and natural light maximization through large windows.
Adjacent to the living room with sustainable bamboo accents and energy-efficient lighting.
Fully-equipped kitchen using low-energy appliances and locally-sourced materials; designed for efficient workflow following Vastu guidelines.
Well-ventilated bathroom with eco-friendly fixtures and natural light.
Dedicated home office space designed for quiet work, ensuring a north-facing orientation to enhance productivity as per Vastu principles.
Compact living space for domestic help, featuring basic amenities and efficient use of space. Includes a small kitchenette and bathroom to maintain privacy.

openings.description: A secure, eco-friendly main door made from recycled materials, positioned for positive Vastu flow.
Energy-efficient windows ensuring natural ventilation and light throughout the cottage.
An accessible opening to the outdoor swimming pool area, designed with water conservation in mind.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with south-west facing windows for relaxation and energy balance. Features eco-friendly insulation.
Private bathroom with water-saving fixtures and natural lighting.

openings.description: Provides access to an outdoor space that aligns with Vastu principles by allowing fresh air circulation and sunlight.

rooms.description: A dedicated space for reading or study, positioned to receive ample morning light.
Additional bedroom designed for guests, with an adjoining bathroom that is Vastu-aligned for harmony.
Well-equipped guest bathroom with sustainable fixtures.
